TOKENSAYS.setting.isActive.label: Activate Token Says
TOKENSAYS.setting.isActive.description: Activates all of the active token says rules for this world.
TOKENSAYS.setting.suppressPrivateGMRoles.label: Suppress Token Says on Private GM Rolls
TOKENSAYS.setting.suppressPrivateGMRoles.descripti: Token Says will not be invoked when a roll is made in Private GM Role mode.
TOKENSAYS.setting.suppressChatBubble.label: Suppress Token Says Chat Bubbles
TOKENSAYS.setting.suppressChatBubble.description: Stops Token Says chat bubbles from invoking on tokens for the given rule configuration types.
TOKENSAYS.setting.suppressChatMessage.label: Suppress Token Says Chat Messages
TOKENSAYS.setting.suppressChatMessage.description: Stops Token Says messages from displaying in the chat log for the given rule configuration types.
TOKENSAYS.setting.audioDuration.label: Audio Maximum Duration
TOKENSAYS.setting.audioDuration.description: Set a maximum duration (in seconds) for any audio tracks played by Token Says. Helps prevent long running audio.
TOKENSAYS.setting.suppressAudio.label: Suppress Token Says Audio
TOKENSAYS.setting.suppressAudio.description: Stops Token Says audio from invoking.
TOKENSAYS.setting.worldRollableTableInd.label: Search World's Rollable Tables First
TOKENSAYS.setting.worldRollableTableInd.descriptio: Activate this if you want Token Says rule to first browse the rollable tables in this world for the specified table name in the rule (and use this instead) before performing a compendium search.
TOKENSAYS.setting.defaultRollableTableCompendium.d: This is the compendium that will be accessed by default when determining where the rule's rolltable is stored. Individual rules may override this default.
TOKENSAYS.setting.worldAudioInd.label: Search World's Playlists First
TOKENSAYS.setting.worldAudioInd.description: Activate this if you want Token Says rule to first browse the audio playlists in this world for the specified audio file in the rule (and use this instead) before performing a compendium search.
TOKENSAYS.setting.defaultAudioCompendium.label: Default Playlist Compendium
TOKENSAYS.setting.defaultAudioCompendium.descripti: This is the compendium that will be accessed by default when determining where the rule's audio file is stored. Individual rules may override this default.
TOKENSAYS.setting.chatBubbleSize.name: Chat Bubble Magnification
TOKENSAYS.setting.chatBubbleSize.label: Set a number to magnify the chat bubble font size with.
TOKENSAYS.setting.tokenSaysRules.name: Configure Token Says Rules
TOKENSAYS.setting.tokenSaysRules.label: Open Rules Settings
TOKENSAYS.setting.tokenSaysRule.name: Configure Rule
TOKENSAYS.setting.rules.label: Rules
TOKENSAYS.setting.rules.description: A list of all rules entered for this world.
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.label.label: Rule Name
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.name.label: Token Name
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.isActorName.label: Use Actor Name
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.isActorName.description: When active, this rule will be linked to the triggering token using the token's actor name and any messaging will output the actor's name and portrait, otherwise linking will use token name and messaging the token name and image.
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.documentType.label: Action Type
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.documentName.label: Action Name
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.documentName.description: The trigger action. Typically this is the name of the item. Leave blank to include all actions by this character for the given action type.
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.fileName.label: Source Name
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.fileName.description: The source that determines what the token will say. For rollable tables, this is the table name. For audio, this is the playlist, and for text, this is what the token says.
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.fileTitle.label: Token Says
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.fileTitle.description: For rollable tables, this bypasses the roll and the token will say what is included here. For audio, this is the file name in the playlist - leave blank in order to shuffle the playlist.
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.compendiumName.label: Compendium
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.compendiumName.description: The compendium from which to retrieve the file (rollable table or audio playlist). Leave blank to source from your default compendium.
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.isActive.label: Active
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.likelihood.label: Likelihood
TOKENSAYS.setting.rule.likelihood.description: The percent likelihood that the token will say something when the triggering action is invoked.
TOKENSAYS.document-type-options.attack.label: Attack Roll
TOKENSAYS.document-type-options.damage.label: Damage Roll
TOKENSAYS.document-type-options.initiative.label: Initiative Roll
TOKENSAYS.document-type-options.flavor.label: Item Name
TOKENSAYS.document-type-options.ability.label: Ability Check
TOKENSAYS.document-type-options.save.label: Saving Throw
TOKENSAYS.document-type-options.macro.label: Macro (API)
TOKENSAYS.document-type-options.skill.label: Skill
